trans-unit.source: Command identifier of the previously highlighted item

target.mrk: Command identifier of the previously highlighted item

trans-unit.source: Command identifier of the item about to be highlighted

seg-source.mrk: Command identifier of the item about to be highlighted

trans-unit.source: Flags that indicate why the hot item has changed. This can be one or more of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Flags that indicate why the hot item has changed.
This can be one or more of the following values:

target.mrk: Flags that indicate why the hot item has changed.
This can be one or more of the following values:

trans-unit.source: $HICF_ACCELERATOR - The change in the hot item was caused by a shortcut key

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_ACCELERATOR - The change in the hot item was caused by a shortcut key

target.mrk: $HICF_ACCELERATOR - The change in the hot item was caused by a shortcut key

trans-unit.source: $HICF_ARROWKEYS - The change in the hot item was caused by an arrow key

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_ARROWKEYS - The change in the hot item was caused by an arrow key

target.mrk: $HICF_ARROWKEYS - The change in the hot item was caused by an arrow key

trans-unit.source: $HICF_DUPACCEL - Modifies $HICF_ACCELERATOR. If this flag is set, more than one item has the same shortcut key character

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_DUPACCEL - Modifies $HICF_ACCELERATOR.
If this flag is set, more than one item has the same shortcut key character

target.mrk: $HICF_DUPACCEL - Modifies $HICF_ACCELERATOR.
If this flag is set, more than one item has the same shortcut key character

trans-unit.source: $HICF_ENTERING - Modifies the other reason flags. If this flag is set, there is no previous hot item and idOld does not contain valid information

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_ENTERING - Modifies the other reason flags.
If this flag is set, there is no previous hot item and idOld does not contain valid information

target.mrk: $HICF_ENTERING - Modifies the other reason flags.
If this flag is set, there is no previous hot item and idOld does not contain valid information

trans-unit.source: $HICF_LEAVING - Modifies the other reason flags. If this flag is set, there is no new hot item and idNew does not contain valid information

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_LEAVING - Modifies the other reason flags.
If this flag is set, there is no new hot item and idNew does not contain valid information

target.mrk: $HICF_LEAVING - Modifies the other reason flags.
If this flag is set, there is no new hot item and idNew does not contain valid information

trans-unit.source: $HICF_LMOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a left-click mouse event

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_LMOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a left-click mouse event

target.mrk: $HICF_LMOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a left-click mouse event

trans-unit.source: $HICF_MOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a mouse event

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_MOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a mouse event

target.mrk: $HICF_MOUSE - The change in the hot item resulted from a mouse event

trans-unit.source: $HICF_OTHER - The change in the hot item resulted from an event that could not be determined. This will most often be due to a change in focus or the $TB_SETHOTITEM message

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_OTHER - The change in the hot item resulted from an event that could not be determined.
This will most often be due to a change in focus or the $TB_SETHOTITEM message

target.mrk: $HICF_OTHER - The change in the hot item resulted from an event that could not be determined.
This will most often be due to a change in focus or the $TB_SETHOTITEM message

trans-unit.source: $HICF_RESELECT - The change in the hot item resulted from the user entering the shortcut key for an item that was already hot

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_RESELECT - The change in the hot item resulted from the user entering the shortcut key for an item that was already hot

target.mrk: $HICF_RESELECT - The change in the hot item resulted from the user entering the shortcut key for an item that was already hot

trans-unit.source: $HICF_TOGGLEDROPDOWN - Version 5.80. Causes the button to switch states

seg-source.mrk: $HICF_TOGGLEDROPDOWN - Version 5.80.
Causes the button to switch states

target.mrk: $HICF_TOGGLEDROPDOWN - Version 5.80.
Causes the button to switch states
